ygData.subject: Re: Soloing at 23
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I stopped soloing completely long before 23 so I don t really know (anyone think it may be harder for a bard to solo on a young server, where banded is
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, Aug 29/99, Elijah Meeker <elijah@...> wrote:
> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> Someone asked about this a short time ago and as I am currently 23 I was
> excited about hearing any replies, welp, there were none, and I think I know
> at least part of why. These are some tough levels to solo. And what soloing
> you can do can be pretty tedious.

I stopped soloing completely long before 23 so I don't really know
(anyone think it may be harder for a bard to solo on a young server,
where banded is still the only armor available to a medium size bard
until well into the 30's?) However, I have seen someone claim they were
able to solo in unrest in their mid 20's. How they would do it is a bit
beyond me, especially and manage to avoid yard trash joining the fight.
(or is unrest so heavily camped now that even the yard trash is rare?)
